meaningMnemonic: You know how 月 can also mean <kanji>month</kanji>? If you add 末 on there you have the "month end" aka the <vocabulary>end of the month</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since 月 has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

When it's the <vocabulary>end of the month</vocabulary>, everybody <reading>gets</reading> <reading>mats</reading> (げつまつ). We don't pay people in money at Tofugu, but everyone gets mats at the <vocabulary>month end</vocabulary> instead.
